entry.title: Coinbase Intensifies Legal Push for SEC's Views on Ethereum
entry.summary: In an ongoing legal battle between Coinbase and the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), the crypto exchange is intensifying efforts to access critical internal communications that could shed light on how the regulator views Ethereum (ETH) and other digital tokens. Coinbase's Quest for SEC Documents Coinbase asked a federal judge to rule on whether it can obtain SEC documents related to the agency's discussions on cryptocurrencies, Coindesk reported. These documents, which were initially denied by the SEC, could reportedly reveal the regulator's stance on whether Ethereum and similar tokens should be considered securities, potentially impacting the future of the digital asset industry in the US. History Associates, acting as an intermediary for Coinbase, filed a not…

entry.title: Shiba Inu Sees Massive 7,911% Spike In Burn Rate, Will This Catalyze SHIB Price To $0.00008?
entry.summary:
Shiba Inu (SHIB) has witnessed a massive spike in its burn rate in the last 24 hours, providing a bullish outlook for the second-largest meme coin by market cap. This development is significant as the surge in the Shiba Inu burn rate could help spark a SHIB price rally to its current all-time high (ATH) of $0.00008.
Shiba Inu Burn Rate Spikes By 7,911%
Shibburn data shows that the Shiba Inu burn rate has spiked by 7,911% in the last 24 hours, with 281.9 million SHIB tokens burned during this period. One transaction accounted for most of these tokens, as 277.5 million SHIB tokens were sent to a dead wallet. Meanwhile, another 7.2 million SHIB tokens were burnt in one single transaction.
It is also worth mentioning that the 281.9 million SHIB tokens burned in the last 24 hours also…

entry.title: Spot Litecoin ETF On The Horizon? Canary Capital Seeks SEC Green Light
entry.summary:
In a notable development for the cryptocurrency market, asset management firm Canary Capital has officially filed an S-1 registration statement with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to launch the first spot Litecoin ETF in the country.
Canary Capital Seeks To Launch Litecoin ETF
In a statement released on Tuesday, Canary Capital emphasized that Litecoin offers a “unique and compelling investment opportunity”. They highlighted that Litecoin has a considerable track record, having maintained 100% uptime since its launch, which they believe could be beneficial to their ultimate goal of managing a Litecoin ETF for further exposure.
Canary Capital also noted that Litecoin has been the leading cryptocurrency for real-world payments, particularly through its partnership w…

entry.title: Crypto Comeback: Bitcoin ETFs Attract $556 Million In Fresh Inflows
entry.summary:
Spot Bitcoin US exchange-traded funds (ETFs) are roaring today, recording the highest inflow in four months as a total sum of $556 million streamed into 12 funds. Coincidentally, by the time the inflow was received, Bitcoin was rebounding as it touched a two-week high at $66,500.
The highest single-day flow, at $239 million, came in through Farside (FBTC), the highest since June. Others performing well include Bitwise (BITB) at $100 million and BlackRock (IBIT) which managed to attract new investors to the rake in $79.51 million.
Increased Activity Across Funds
Several funds posted inflows as the market continued to rally. The shares of ARK Invest and 21Shares (ARKB) stood at nearly $70 million, while Grayscale (GBTC), the bitcoin trust, recorded its first inflow since September at…

entry.title: Cardano Development And Research Are ‘Dramatically Speeding Up,’ Says Hoskinson
entry.summary:
Charles Hoskinson, the founder of Cardano, has revealed substantial progress in the development and research of new protocols. Via X, Hoskinson stated: “Ouroboros Peras is one of the best prototyped protocols we have—a literate Agda specification, a CIP, simulations, and a working prototype prior to the final paper being published. Already negotiating implementation SoW.”
Moreover, Hoskinson made public that human resources are now allocated to Ouroboros Leios. “Research and innovation are dramatically speeding up. The team is now moving all resources to Leios, and 6.8 FTEs are already working on rapid innovation,” he remarked.
The mention of “implementation SoW” refers to the negotiation of an Implementation Statement of Work, a formal document that outlines the specific tasks, delive…

entry.summary: Fastex Chief Legal Officer Vardan Khachatryan joined Rug Radio creator Mlow at DACOM Summit to discuss how the crypto exchange is advancing compliance, and the regulatory challenges that lie ahead for the sector.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 210 - MIDDLE EAST TENSIONS RISE
entry.summary: Crypto drops as Middle East tensions flare. $500m liquidations in drop. BTC ETFs see largest outflows in a month. Fidelity ETH ETF sees 2nd highest outflow ever. SUI hits 6-month highs, bridge goes live on mainnet. Hashdex set to launch XRP ETF. Wormhole leads altcoin gains after Upbit lists. BTC miners hit record low profits in September Crypto hackers stole $750m in Q3. Telegram has been disclosing IPs since 2018.

entry.title: How Arbitrum is Simplifying Web3 for Web2 Adopters
entry.summary: Arbitrum's Head of Korea, John Park, joined Rug Radio creator Pukerainbow at ArbiVerse to talk about the Ethereum layer-2's strategy in Asia, hackathons, and bringing enterprise clients to its ecosystem.

entry.title: Rep. Tom Emmer Is Confident Crypto Laws Are Coming Soon—No Matter Who Wins the Election
entry.summary: Republican Majority Whip Tom Emmer sat down with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano to discuss the state of crypto legislation, Kamala Harris, Fairshake, and more at Messari Mainnet 2024.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 209 - LET UPTOBER BEGIN!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs see inflows for 8 straight days. SUI enters top 20, $110m of unlocks today. SOL weekly DEX volume flips ETH. Firedancer sees very fast TPS on Testnet. ETH gas up 500% in 2 weeks. EIGEN opens at $7bn FDV. FTX creditors vote in favour of restructuring plan. Dell to sell another $1.2bn Dell stock. Metaplanet buys another 107 BTC.Grayscale opens decentralised AI fund to investors. Robinhood allows crypto transfer in EU. Pollak to head Coinbase Wallet & join exec team. Gemini to close in Canada. Japan considers lower cap gains tax on crypto. Ohio bill would make it legal to pay taxes in crypto. Trump project opens whitelist to non-US users. CZ pledges to invest in blockchain companies.

entry.title: Binance CEO Richard Teng Talks Progress on Exchange's Global Regulatory Goals
entry.summary: Decrypt Reporters Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano spoke with Binance CEO Richard Teng about the crypto exchange's progress on establishing a global headquarters, improving its relationships with regulators, and expanding its global presence in the wake of founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao's jailing in the U.S.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 207 - WELCOME BACK TO THE BULL!
entry.summary: Kamala signals support for crypto. Top memecoins all soar, add $10bn in value in a week. MOODENG hits $180m, does 11x in a week. SUI & SEI continue to lead L1s for price & TVL growth. Revolut & Robinhood are considering stablecoin. Visa launches new tokenisation platform for banks. PayPal to allow business accounts to hold crypto Hamster kombat's HMSTER disappoints on launch. Biden admin may have forced Silvergate’s closure. Court rules crypto mining boxes ‘are securities’.
